attributes.action: make nhs check all mothers to be over if they believe they are in labour and not just send them home
attributes.additional_details: please educate the nhs staff in listening to there patients. make them check all pregnant women who believe they are in labour over and not send them home after all who knows there own bodies better then the person in pain.and when they check them over a say there not yet in labour and keep that women in over night "to keep an eye on them" keep an eye on them check the patient over a few hours later these simple things can save a babies life and the life of the mother.
